name: Salita
description:
Salita

Lead Designer and Project Manager: Jaynel Dugos
Lead Programmer: Pierre Chua
Lead Artist: Justine Fabian
Mechanics Programmer: Paolo Arevalo and Marvin Mendoza

Adviser: Christian Arriola

While studying for a Filipino Exam, too bad you have been in the country for a short time after coming back from overseas. While finding a fun way to study for the exam, you stumble upon an online game and quickly clicked the link to the game’s homepage. After registering for the online game. Your eyes became heavy and you fell asleep as you woke up into this unfamiliar world and was quickly approached by a person you cannot understand. Questions filled your mind will you be able to go back to your own world?

Research and Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_CYt3BHOJ3RXP5ceHGMv4CU28E-GdQCj/view?usp=shari...
